## User Stories
As a [type of user], I want [some goal/feature] so that [some reason].

**Example:**
- As a developer, I want to easily switch between Celo networks so that I can test my dApp across different environments.
- As a user, I want to see my transaction history so that I can track my recent activity.

- **Component/Module:** [e.g. WalletConnectUI, NetworkSwitch, BalanceDisplay]

## Acceptance Criteria

## Priority
- [ ] Low - Nice to have, doesn't block anyone
- [ ] Medium - Would improve developer/user experience
- [ ] High - Addresses significant gap in functionality
- [ ] Critical - Essential for project goals
